content.body: oooh I love that having a fall meeting in Tokyo is becoming tradition

> <@mhofman:matrix.org> Looks like JS Conf announced dates for next year. Not sure how it fits in our plenary calendar.
> https://openjsf.org/blog/why-attend-jsconf-na-2025

no conflict there - but jsconf LatAm was also just announced yesterday for sometime in November. I’ve already let them know about tc39’s dates to hopefully avoid a conflict.

Looks like JS Conf announced dates for next year. Not sure how it fits in our plenary calendar. https://openjsf.org/blog/why-attend-jsconf-na-2025
no conflict there - but jsconf LatAm was also just announced yesterday for sometime in November. I’ve already let them know about tc39’s dates to hopefully avoid a conflict.

content.body: Do we have dates setup for next year already?

Ah 12h ago it wasn't. I'm not crazy.
